remarks: The zero vector in a submodule equals the zero vector in the including module.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lss0v.x $e |- X = ( W |`s U ) $.
lss0v.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
lss0v.z $e |- Z = ( 0g ` X ) $.
lss0v.l $e |- L = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lss0v $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ U e. L ) -> Z = .0. ) $.
